uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component

Class DirectAudioPlayerComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component.DirectAudioPlayerComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AudioCallback, MediaPlayerEventListener

    public class DirectAudioPlayerComponent
extends Object
implements MediaPlayerEventListener, AudioCallback
    Encapsulation of a direct audio player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectAudioPlayerComponent(String format, int rate, int channels)
      Create a direct audio player component.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectAudioPlayerComponent

        public DirectAudioPlayerComponent(String format,
                          int rate,
                          int channels)
        Create a direct audio player component.
        Parameters:
        format - decoded audio buffer format
        rate - decoded audio rate
        channels - decoded audio channels

    • Method Detail

      • getMediaPlayerFactory

        public final MediaPlayerFactory getMediaPlayerFactory()
        Get the media player factory reference.
        Returns:
        media player factory

      • getMediaPlayer

        public final DirectAudioPlayer getMediaPlayer()
        Get the direct audio player reference.

        An application uses this handle to control the media player, add listeners and so on.

        Returns:
        media player

      • release

        public final void release()
        Release the media player component and the associated native media player resources.

        The associated media player factory will not be released, the client application is responsible for releasing the factory at the appropriate time.

      • release

        public final void release(boolean releaseFactory)
        Release the media player component and the associated media player factory.

        Optionally release the media player factory.

        This method invokes release(), then depending on the value of the releaseFactory parameter the associated factory will also be released.

        Parameters:
        releaseFactory - true if the factory should also be released; false if it should not

                 int subItemIndex)
        Description copied from interface: MediaPlayerEventListener
        A sub-item was played.

        There is no guarantee the sub-item actually started, but it was at least attempted to be played.

        Specified by:
        subItemPlayed in interface MediaPlayerEventListener
        Parameters:
        mediaPlayer - media player that raised the event

      • endOfSubItems

        public void endOfSubItems(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer)
        Description copied from interface: MediaPlayerEventListener
        The end of the media sub-items was reached.

        This event will not be raised if the sub-items are being repeated.

        Specified by:
        endOfSubItems in interface MediaPlayerEventListener
        Parameters:
        mediaPlayer - media player that raised the event
